mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECIPE WHERE RECIPE_ST = 'N'

SELECT R.RECIPE_NO, R.RECIPE_TITLE,U.USER_NICKNAME,R.RECIPE_CONTENT, R.RECIPE_INGREDIENT,R.RECIPE_PRICE,R.RECIPE_COOKTIME, R.RECIPE_CAL,R.RECIPE_HYDRO,R.RECIPE_PROTEIN, R.RECIPE_FAT,RECIPE_SOD,R.RECIPE_FIBER,R.RECIPE_CNT, R.RECIPE_ST,R.RECIPE_CREATE_DT,R.RECIPE_UPDATE_DT, R.RECIPE_IMG,RECIPE_URL
FROM "RECIPE" R JOIN "USER_INFO" U ON R.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE R.RECIPE_ST = 'N' ORDER BY R.RECIPE_NO DESC

SELECT R.RECIPE_NO, R.USER_NO,R.RECIPE_TITLE,U.USER_NICKNAME,R.RECIPE_CONTENT, R.RECIPE_INGREDIENT,R.RECIPE_PRICE,R.RECIPE_COOKTIME, R.RECIPE_CAL,R.RECIPE_HYDRO,R.RECIPE_PROTEIN, R.RECIPE_FAT,RECIPE_SOD,R.RECIPE_FIBER,R.RECIPE_CNT, R.RECIPE_ST,R.RECIPE_CREATE_DT,R.RECIPE_UPDATE_DT, R.RECIPE_IMG,RECIPE_URL
FROM "RECIPE" R JOIN "USER_INFO" U ON R.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE R.RECIPE_ST = 'N' AND R.RECIPE_NO = ${recipeNo}
